title: I bought a Pixel 4a today. It's front camera is too noisy and blurry. Is there anyway to fix it?
content: As per other people's posts online, I tried restarting and resetting my phone. I also tried the 12-16 inch distance. But the quality is just pathetic. On video calls, the front camera is so noisy that it looks like I am using a 10 year old 2 MP camera.
